subject: Wrestling
Deaths (Obituaries)
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Mr. Savage, with his trademark sunglasses, bandannas and raspy voice, was one of the most recognizable professional wrestlers of the 1980s and ’90s as the character Macho Man.
snippet: Mr. Savage, with his trademark sunglasses, bandannas and raspy voice, was one of the most recognizable professional wrestlers of the 1980s and ’90s as the character Macho Man.
